etymology.description: 耒(耒) (lěi, "tilling tool") + 禺(禺) (yú, "ape") = paired working in the fields -> to pair
etymology.interpretation: The character 耦(耦) (ǒu, "to pair") combines the semantic component 耒(耒) (lěi, "tilling tool") to signify agriculture or working in the fields, with the phonetic component 禺(禺) (yú, "ape"), which also contributes to the phonetic sound. Together, they indicate the concept of working or pairing together.
